name: Gray G. Haddock
detail:
Gray Haddock is the animation producer at Rooster Teeth Productions, and the voice actor for Roman Torchwick and the White Fang Lieutenant in RWBY. He is also known for voicing Locus and General Doyle in Red vs. Blue , as well as Rusty Bonjour in X-Ray and Vav.

  With Rooster Teeth, he has worked on reality game show The Gauntlet, as well as being lead compositor on Red vs. Blue Seasons 9 and 10. His other work includes director of photography on various live action projects, post production supervisor and editor.

  Prior to his work with Rooster Teeth, Gray worked on various films, anime, television series and video games, both in voice acting roles and visual effects.
